mouselock.name: MouseLock
mouselock.description: Allows the game to lock the cursor from a key or with an in-game command. Outputs raw x/y movment from mouse. Esc to exit (this cannot be overridden--don't keybind esc to anything else). Chrome/Firefox only.
mouselock.help-url: http://<your website or a manual entry on Scirra.com>

activate-on.name: Activate On
activate-on.desc: Single Click and Double Click are self explanatory. Custom Key activates on...a custom key.

bounding.name: Bounding
bounding.desc: Bound to Window and Bound to Layer do just that. Unbounded is for custom (event based) bounding.

disable-ıf-unlock.name: Disable If Unlock
disable-ıf-unlock.desc: Disable RawX/Y and MouseLockX/Y if mouse is not locked. Said values will read 0.

enable-quantum-tunnelling.name: Enable Quantum Tunnelling
enable-quantum-tunnelling.desc: Enable Quantum Tunnelling. This may be entirely useless.

movement-properties.name: Movement Properties
movement-properties.desc: Properties that affect the movement of the cursor.

cursor-speed.name: Cursor Speed
cursor-speed.desc: How fast cursor moves in relation to normal cursor speed. 2 would be twice as fast, 0.5 half as fast, etc.

dead-zone.name: Dead Zone
dead-zone.desc: If cursor is moving slowly, movements are ignored. More specifically: if per-tick change is under this value for RawX/Y, ignore the change.

speed-cap.name: Speed Cap
speed-cap.desc: If per tick change is over cap, clamp to cap. So: cap is 100, x movement is 127, x movement equal 100. 0(default) is disabled.

ıssupported0.description: True if mouse lock is supported. For now, only supported in Firefox and Chrome.

ısmoving2.description: True if mouse is moving. This can be affected by the deadzone.

setmouselock1.description: Manually enable/disable the mouse lock. If 'Activate On' is set to 'Manual Trigger', this command is the only way to lock the mouse.

setcustomlockactivatekey9.display-text: Set Custom Lock Activate Key to [b]{0}[/b].
setcustomlockactivatekey9.description: Choose a custom key to activate mouse lock. Defaults to Enter/Return (keycode 13) 'Activate On' must be set to 'Custom Key' for this to work.

custom_lock_activate_key0.name: Custom Lock Activate Key
custom_lock_activate_key0.desc: Choose a custom key to activate mouse lock. 'Activate On' must be set to 'Custom Key' for this to work. Note that international users and users on different operating systems or devices may not have the same keys available.

rawx1.description: (X axis)Raw mouse position change from last tick.

rawy2.description: (Y axis)Raw mouse position change from last tick.

mouselockx3.description: (X axis)Mouse position on current layer (layout?). Can be unbound, or bound to window(parm Bounding).

mouselocky4.description: (Y axis)Mouse position on current layer (layout?). Can be unbound, or bound to window(parm Bounding).

movementangle5.description: Cursor's angle of movement. Computed from last two or three positions. If no movement, returns -1.
